contents.text: Thank you for calling Visby in San Francisco, pioneers in industrial light field technology.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For product demonstrations and technical specifications, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo and get detailed technical specifications
I need a demo and detailed specs on your light field technology for a defense training project.
I need to schedule a hands-on demo and get the full technical specifications for Visby’s industrial light-field sensor.
I need help understanding how your light field technology works and would like a demonstration.
I need detailed technical specifications and a demo of your light field camera for my research project.

contents.text: For pricing details and custom quotes, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for a quote.

navigationGoals: Obtain a custom pricing quote for an industrial light field system
I’d like pricing and a custom quote for integrating your displays into my veteran-owned workshop.
I need a detailed pricing breakdown and a custom quote for bulk procurement of Visby light-field modules.
I’d like to get pricing information and a custom quote for a system.
I’d like a custom quote on a high-resolution light field sensor for my experimental setup.

contents.text: For customer support and service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Get immediate help troubleshooting a technical issue with my device
I’m having calibration issues with my unit and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m troubleshooting calibration errors in my Visby light-field capture setup and need advanced technical support.
My device isn’t working properly; I need technical support to troubleshoot it.
I’m having calibration issues with my light field imaging system and need technical support to troubleshoot.

contents.text: For repair services and maintenance agreements, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our repair and maintenance department.

navigationGoals: Arrange repair service and discuss a maintenance agreement for my equipment
I want to schedule a repair service and set up a maintenance agreement for my Visby system.
I want to arrange a hardware repair visit and renew our maintenance agreement for the Visby light-field system.
I want to set up a repair or maintenance service for my equipment.
I want to arrange repair service and a maintenance agreement for our lab’s light field capture device.
